    The entity's transform.

    Eases between an origin and destination transform by a step in [0.0, 1.0].

    Eases between an origin and destination transform by a step in [0.0, 1.0].

    Creates a new transform with the components of this transform.

    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0], returning a transform.

    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.

    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.

    A helper function to set the transform's from either separate vectors or from the columns of a matrix.

    Creates a transform from axes.

    Creates a transform from a ray.
    static Transform3 Transform3.fromDir​(Vec3 dir, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Creates a transform from a direction.
    Transform3 Transform3.getAxes​(Vec3 right, Vec3 forward, Vec3 up)
    Get the transform's axes.
    static Transform3 Transform3.identity​(Transform3 target)
    Sets the transform to the identity.
    Transform3 Transform3.lookAt​(Vec3 point, float step, Handedness handedness)
    Orients the transform to look at a target point.

    The transform eases toward the look at rotation because discontinuities arise with using a look at matrix when a transform's look direction is parallel with the world up axis.
    static Transform3 Transform3.mix​(Transform3[] frames, float step, Transform3 target)
    Eases an array through a series of transforms according to a step in [0.0, 1.0].
    static Transform3 Transform3.mix​(Transform3 origin, Transform3 dest, float step, Transform3 target)
    Mixes two transforms together by a step in [0.0, 1.0] .
    Transform3 Transform3.moveBy​(Vec3 dir)
    Moves the transform by a direction to a new location.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveByGlobal​(Vec3 dir)
    Moves the transform by a direction to a new location.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveByLocal​(Vec3 dir)
    Moves the transform by a direction multiplied by the transform's rotation.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveTo​(Vec3 locNew)
    Sets the transforms' location.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveTo​(Vec3 locNew, float step)
    Eases the transform to a location by a step.
    Transform3 Transform3.moveTo​(Vec3 locNew, float step, Vec3.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Eases the transform to a location by a step.
    static Transform3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the face's normal.
    static Transform3 Vert3.orientation​(Vert3 vert, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the vertex's normal.
    Transform3 Transform3.reset()
    Resets this transform to the identity.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateBy​(Quaternion rot)
    Rotates the transform by adding a rotation, then normalizing.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew)
    Rotates the transform to a new orientation, then updates the transform's axes.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew, float step)
    Eases the transform toward a new orientation by a step in [0.0, 1.0] .
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateTo​(Quaternion rotNew, float step, Quaternion.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Eases the transform toward a new orientation by a step in [0.0, 1.0] using the specified easing function.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates this transform around the x axis by an angle in radians.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates this transform around the y axis by an angle in radians.
    Transform3 Transform3.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this transform around the z axis by an angle in radians.
    Transform3 Transform3.scaleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the transform by a uniform scalar.
    Transform3 Transform3.scaleBy​(Vec3 nonUniformScale)
    Scales the transform by a non-uniform scalar.

    Non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    Transform3 Transform3.scaleTo​(float scalar)
    Scales the transform to a uniform size.
    Transform3 Transform3.scaleTo​(Vec3 scaleNew)
    Scales the transform to a non-uniform size.

    Non-uniform scaling may lead to improper shading of a mesh when lit.
    Transform3 Transform3.scaleTo​(Vec3 scaleNew, float step)
    Eases the transform to a scale by a step.
    Transform3 Transform3.scaleTo​(Vec3 scaleNew, float step, Vec3.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Eases the transform to a scale by a step.

    Sets this transform from loose real numbers.

    Promotes a 2D transform to a 3D transform.

    Sets this transform to the components of another.

    A helper function to set the transform's from either separate vectors or from the columns of a matrix.
    Transform3 Transform3.setAxes​(Vec3 right, Vec3 forward, Vec3 up)
    Sets a transform's rotation to the provided axes.
    Transform3 Transform3.wrap​(Vec3 lb, Vec3 ub)
    Wraps the transform's location around a periodic range as defined by an upper and lower bound: lower bounds inclusive; upper bounds exclusive.
